scripts.test:debug: Set DEBUG=Y && HEADLESS=N && npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
scripts.test:demo: Set DEBUG=N && Set HEADLESS=N && npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
scripts.test:smoke: Set DEBUG=N && HEADLESS=Y && npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@smoke'
scripts.uat:demo: Set DEBUG=N && HEADLESS=N && npx wdio config/wdio.uat.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
scripts.uat:smoke: Set DEBUG=N && HEADLESS=Y && npx wdio config/wdio.uat.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@smoke'
